sourcesContent:
<template>
  <v-app id="app">
    <AppBar :drawer='drawer' @openDrawer='toggleDrawer' @closeDrawer='toggleDrawer' />
    <NavDrawer :drawer='drawer' />
    <v-main>
      <v-container fluid>
        <router-view />
        <SnackBar />
      </v-container>
    </v-main>
    <v-footer app padless>
      <AppFooter />
    </v-footer>
  </v-app>
</template>

<script>
import AppBar from '@/components/AppBar'
import AppNavDrawer from '@/components/AppNavDrawer'
import AppFooter from '@/components/AppFooter'
import SnackBar from '@/components/shared/SnackBar'
import axios from 'axios'

export default {
  name: 'App',
  components: {
    AppBar,
    NavDrawer,
    PageFooter,
    SnackBar,
  },
  data: () => ({
    drawer: false,
  }),
  methods: {
    toggleDrawer(value) {
      // console.log('value: ', value)
      this.drawer = value
    }
  },
}
</script>
